title: event.openingHours

items.description: Indicates the weekly start and end times of a `periodic` event.

opens.title: openingHoursTime
opens.description: A string in the format of ISO-8601 hour and minutes, representing an opening- or closing time. For example `17:00`.

closes.title: openingHoursTime
closes.description: A string in the format of ISO-8601 hour and minutes, representing an opening- or closing time. For example `17:00`.

dayOfWeek.description: One or more days that the opening and closing hour are applicable for.

description: A list of opening hour entries indicating the weekly start and end times of the [event](./event.json) when using the `periodic` [calendarType](./event-calendarType.json).
